bio: Tellevi serves as a maid at both Karthwasten and Sky Haven Temple. She was married to the Imperial torturer found dead at Helgen after the dragon attack. She reveals that she married her husband after swearing an oath given to her by a priest of mara ‘to be bound in love, now and forever’. Her husband mistreated her, but she still feels it is a shame that he died.
name: Tellevi
